sections.title: Introduction & Context
sections.goal: Establish the interviewee’s role in the Vesta FinOps project and align on objectives.
sample_questions: Can you briefly describe your responsibilities in the Vesta FinOps project?
How does your work align with Novereon Systems' mission and values?
What are the main KPIs you monitor for cost optimization?

sections.title: Current Processes & Tools
sections.goal: Understand the existing FinOps workflows, tools, and policy compliance requirements.
sample_questions: Which runbooks or RFCs are most relevant to your daily work?
How do you ensure compliance with POL-FIN-007 on Cloud Cost Budgets & Quotas?
Can you walk me through a typical cost anomaly detection cycle?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Explore how Vesta FinOps integrates with other projects and departments.
sample_questions: How does cost optimization data from Vesta feed into projects like Quasar Billing or Hyperion Cost Explorer?
Can you describe a scenario where FinOps insights influenced SRE or Platform team decisions?
What are the main challenges in aligning guardrails across multiple product phases?

sections.title: Challenges & Risks
sections.goal: Identify pain points, risk factors, and mitigation strategies in FinOps operations.
sample_questions: What are the top three risks you see in sustaining cloud cost optimization?
How do you handle trade-offs between savings and performance SLAs?
Can you share an example from a ticket or audit where a policy breach was detected and resolved?

sections.title: Decision Making & Future Improvements
sections.goal: Discuss recent decisions, trade-offs, and planned improvements for FinOps processes.
sample_questions: What recent decision had the biggest impact on cost savings?
How do you evaluate the ROI of a new guardrail or quota?
What improvements are you planning for the next quarter to enhance compliance and savings?

sections.title: Wrap-Up
sections.goal: Summarize key takeaways and confirm next steps.
sample_questions: What support do you need from project management to achieve your goals?
Are there any upcoming audits or RFCs that we should prepare for?
Is there anything we haven’t covered that you think is important?
